question.text: How should you use the emergency telephone on a motorway?

explanation.text: Traffic is passing you at speed. If the draught from a large lorry catches you by surprise it could blow you off balance and even onto the carriageway. By facing the oncoming traffic you can see approaching lorries and so be prepared for their draught. You are also in a position to see other hazards approaching.

answer.text: Keep your back to the traffic
